title: Add dictionary feature with AI voice pronunciation and definitions

requirements.summary: Add Dictionary tab to main navigation and create dedicated dictionary route
acceptanceCriteria: Dictionary tab appears in the main navigation alongside existing tabs (Chat, Math, Media, etc.)
Clicking the Dictionary tab navigates to the dictionary interface
Dictionary section is accessible from the main application view

file_operations.description: Add 'Dictionary' tab to the navigation tabs array and create a new route case in the renderContent switch statement that renders the DictionaryView component. Ensure the tab appears in the proper order with the existing tabs (Chat, Math, Media, Translator, Music, Art, Code, Games).

Create the main Dictionary view component that will serve as the container for the dictionary interface. This component will render the search interface and display word definitions with pronunciation controls. Use Tailwind CSS with the existing dark theme (deep blacks with teal/coral accents) to match the application's design patterns.

requirements.summary: Create dictionary search interface with word lookup and definition display
acceptanceCriteria: Search input field allows users to type and search for words
Search results display the word and its full definition
Interface shows clear feedback when a word is not found
Search is case-insensitive and handles common variations

file_operations.description: Implement the search interface with an input field for word lookup, a search button, and a results display area. Show the word and its definition when found, or display a 'Word not found' message when the word doesn't exist in the database. Include loading states during search. Use the useDictionarySearch hook to handle backend queries.

Create a React Query hook that calls the backend getWord method from the actor to retrieve word definitions. Handle loading, error, and success states. Implement case-insensitive search by normalizing input before querying. Use the useActor hook to access the authenticated backend actor.

requirements.summary: Implement AI-powered text-to-speech for word pronunciation using Web Speech API
acceptanceCriteria: Each dictionary word result includes a 'Pronounce' or speaker button
Clicking the button triggers AI voice synthesis to speak the word aloud
Voice pronunciation uses Web Speech API or similar browser-based TTS
Audio playback is clear and audible with proper pronunciation

file_operations.description: Add a pronunciation button (speaker icon) next to each displayed word result. When clicked, trigger the text-to-speech functionality from the useTextToSpeech hook to pronounce the word. Show visual feedback during playback (e.g., pulsing icon or color change).

Create a hook that uses the Web Speech API (SpeechSynthesis interface) to pronounce words. Implement a speak function that takes a word string and triggers voice synthesis with proper English pronunciation settings. Handle browser compatibility checks and provide fallback messaging if TTS is not available. Include playback state management to prevent overlapping pronunciations.
